title: Handle Will Call Ticket Pickup
description: A guest arrives at the box office to pick up tickets that were left for them at will call.

tasks.description: Ask the guest for their name and a photo ID.
Search the will call system for tickets under the guest's name.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an envelope with two tickets for the guest.

tasks.description: Have the guest sign for the tickets and then release them.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent obtains a signature and hands the tickets to the guest.
